'''Kristina Krepela''' is a [[Wikipedia:Croatia|Croatian]]-based actress.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' she plays the role of a [[Qartheen woman]]. She joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
